135868.とても高額なゴールドの 取り引きです！\n間違いがないか よく ご確認ください。:
This is a very expensive gold deal! Please
check carefully to make sure...<color_yellow>This message is displayed when a high value
deal is made...<color_white>Buying and selling game data for real money
(RMT) is prohibited and punishable by law.
Please be careful not to do this...<bw_break>

any more items.
